settings.text: Get occasional updates from A Kids Book About.

settings.title: Choose your books.
settings.subheading: Free shipping and 40% OFF your entire order when you add three or more books to your cart.

settings.heading: Books to start a conversation.
settings.rich_text: A growing collection of books by amazing authors that cover a range of challenging, empowering, and important topics for kids ages 5-9. Beautifully designed from cover to cover to spark the imagination and start a conversation between kids and their grownups.

settings.heading: Kids are ready.
settings.rich_text: The kids in your life are introduced to subjects at an increasingly early age that they are genuinely curious about. Our books help you start those conversations. Each of our authors share their personal experience, or are experts on the topics that they've chosen to write about.

settings.heading: Books that grown with them.
settings.rich_text: If only kids didn’t grow up so fast. But they do and so our book collection will continue to grow along with them. We’ve assembled a group of authors with touching personal stories, incredible expertise, and a lot of wisdom to offer the next generation of thinkers, makers, and doers.

settings.heading: Designed to empower.
settings.rich_text: We believe every kid can be thoughtful, courageous, and empathetic. Every book in our collection is meant to empower them to be their best selves at home and out in the world. Grownups, we even think our books will empower you to be honest and less afraid in knowing what to say to that curious kid in your life.

settings.heading: a kids book about <u>¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†</u>
settings.rich_text: Have an incredible idea for what we should publish next? Reach out to us with a topic that you want to see a kids book about.

settings.heading: Pick three books for 40% off.
settings.rich_text: Add three or more hardback books to your cart, to get 40% off your entire order. Shipping is always free.

settings.heading: Gift some books.
settings.rich_text: Give that kid in your life a way for them to choose which challenging, empowering and important topic they should read about next.

Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.heading: Jelani Memory
settings.rich_text: Jelani Memory is an African American entrepreneur, thinker, and constant learner. He lives in Portland Or, with his wife and six kids. He still wants to be an artist when he grows up.

settings.heading: Emma McIlroy
settings.rich_text: Emma Mcilroy is the Co-Founder & CEO of Wildfang. Wildfang is one of the fastest growing retail brands in USA and exists to help every kind of woman become the best possible version of herself, smashing gender roles and the patriarchy in the process.

settings.heading: Kileah McIlvain
settings.rich_text: Kileah is a writer, musician, knitter, and lover of all things Middle Earth. She and her husband raise hobbits and chickens in the verdant wilds of Washington State.

settings.heading: Ben Kenyon
settings.rich_text: Ben Kenyon is a podcaster, influencer, and founder of The Younique Piece, and a performance coach for the Trail Blazers. He lives in Portland Or, and tries to live generously and with gratitude every day.

settings.heading: Rebecca Alexander
settings.rich_text: Rebecca Alexander is Founder & CEO of AllGo, a community review platform where plus-size people rate the comfort and accessibility of public places so others can know what it’s like before going out.
settings.cta_text: A Kids Book About Body Image

settings.heading: Ben Tertin
settings.rich_text: Ben is a pastor in Portland Or, living out the adventure, that is life, with his wife and two (tree climbing) kids.
